text: Julius Nyamu (born 1 December 1977) is a Kenyan middle-distance runner who specializes in the 3000 metres steeplechase. His personal best time is 8:07.59 minutes, achieved in August 2004 in Brussels. ==Achievements== {| |- |2002 |World Cross Country Championships |Dublin, Ireland |align="center" | 6th |Short race |- | |World Cross Country Championships |Dublin, Ireland |bgcolor=gold align="center" | 1st |Team competition |- |2003 |World Athletics Final |Monte Carlo, Monaco |align="center" | 4th |3000 m st. |- |2004 |World Athletics Final |Monte Carlo, Monaco |align="center" | 8th |3000 m st. |} ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Kenyan male middle-distance runners Category:Kenyan male steeplechase runners Category:Kenyan male cross country runners
title: Julius Nyamu
